Name: Grand Warstorm: Part I
QuestDesc: As the promised raindrops fall upstream, you embark on a journey north to the battlefield in search of answers.

Dialogues.Speaker: Jiyan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: This rain... It's finally happening.

Dialogues.Speaker: Midnight Ranger
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: General.

Dialogues.Speaker: Jiyan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Yes. How's it going?

Dialogues.Speaker: Midnight Ranger
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: We have five hundred remaining soldiers prepared and medically cleared for combat. After receiving the antidote for Retroact Rain, they have reported minimal hallucinations and no adverse effects.

Dialogues.Speaker: Midnight Ranger
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: However, a few veterans still reported sporadic sightings of Phantoms in the rain...

Dialogues.Speaker: Jiyan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I see. Stay alert, we will continue as planned. Report any signs of potential TD Outbreaks immediately.

Dialogues.Speaker: Jiyan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: We march on to the Norfall Barrens as soon as the rain stops.

Dialogues.Speaker: Midnight Ranger
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Aye, sir!

Dialogues.Speaker: Narrator
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: The Retroact Rain falls in Desorock Highland as Jiyan's forces prepare to advance on the Norfall Barrens.

Dialogues.Speaker: Jiyan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: "Stronger emotional connection to the affected area leads to more intense hallucinations"... That's what they said.

Dialogues.Speaker: Jiyan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I should go for another round of inspection. Make sure everything is going as planned.

Dialogues.Speaker: Steadfast Midnight Ranger
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: General.

Dialogues.Speaker: Jiyan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Greetings. How are you feeling after the antidote?

Dialogues.Speaker: Steadfast Midnight Ranger
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I feel much better, but the Phantoms are still coming back from time to time...

Dialogues.Speaker: Steadfast Midnight Ranger
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Three years... It's been three years already.

Dialogues.Speaker: Steadfast Midnight Ranger
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I was on the vanguard team during that battle.

Dialogues.Speaker: Steadfast Midnight Ranger
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Memories of my teammates lost their minds fighting those Phantoms haunts me to this day...

Dialogues.Speaker: Steadfast Midnight Ranger
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Those Phantoms... Illusions of both soldiers and those monsters... They were not real, but somehow they could injure and kill us.

Dialogues.Speaker: Steadfast Midnight Ranger
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: We had to strike them down to survive.

Dialogues.Speaker: Steadfast Midnight Ranger
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: But then… Our dead comrades were coming back to life, ready to stab us behind our backs... It was chaos. We were terrified, couldn't tell friend from foe...

Dialogues.Speaker: Jiyan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: The Retroact Rain contains Remnant energy that can recreate past events and project them as Phantoms.

Dialogues.Speaker: Jiyan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Those Phantoms can transform into familiar people or objects by resonating with living humans in the rain, through their frequencies.

Dialogues.Speaker: Jiyan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: During that battle, the rain's effect was further enhanced by the Threnodian's power.

Dialogues.Speaker: Jiyan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: That was why the Phantoms gained physical forms, and why the rain could recreate very recent events, like bringing back soldiers dead minutes ago.

Dialogues.Speaker: Jiyan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Unaware of the mechanism behind it, we tried to eliminate all the Phantoms, and it only worsened the situation.

Dialogues.Speaker: Jiyan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Now we know the Phantoms are merely replicas of past events.

Dialogues.Speaker: Jiyan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: While not a perfect solution, the antidote for Retroact Rain can lessen its effects and help us differentiate between reality and hallucinations.

Dialogues.Speaker: Jiyan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Keep your chin high. Our fallen comrades wouldn't want to see us down trodden like this.

Dialogues.Speaker: Steadfast Midnight Ranger
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Yes, sir. I will pull myself together!

Dialogues.Speaker: Steadfast Midnight Ranger
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: General... You were there during the Battle Beneath the Crescent, too. Please be careful of the Phantoms in our camp.

Dialogues.Speaker: Narrator
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Despite taking antidotes, many soldiers are still haunted by nightmares of the Battle Beneath the Crescent three years ago. The rain has brought to life their fallen comrades who now fight against them. Jiyan strives to boost morale with a rousing speech.

Dialogues.Speaker: Midnight Ranger on Guard
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: General, we're all clear in the west!

Dialogues.Speaker: Jiyan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Good. Have you had more hallucinations after the antidote?

Dialogues.Speaker: Midnight Ranger on Guard
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: No sign of those Retroact Rain Phantoms they warned us about, but...

Dialogues.Speaker: Midnight Ranger on Guard
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I just heard some weird noises from the north...

Dialogues.Speaker: Jiyan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Stay here and hold your post. I'll go check it out.

Dialogues.Speaker: Midnight Ranger on Guard
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Understood!

Dialogues.Speaker: Paranoid Midnight Ranger
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Can we really trust that medic?

Dialogues.Speaker: Thoughtful Midnight Ranger
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I do think we should be careful... Something's wrong with this rain...

Dialogues.Speaker: Paranoid Midnight Ranger
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Hey! You see? The raindrops... they're falling up! It's the Retroact Rain!

Dialogues.Speaker: Jiyan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: That day... As the rain fell, we watched in uncertainty, unsure whether it was a sign of hope or disaster.

Dialogues.Speaker: Jiyan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: The Retroact Rain should have been a harmless Waveworn Phenomenon.

Dialogues.Speaker: Jiyan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: However... The Threnodian's influence enhanced its effect, turning that battle into a brutal slaughter.

Dialogues.Speaker: Jiyan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Our city cannot endure another tragedy like that...

Dialogues.Speaker: Excited Midnight Ranger
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: This guy packs a serious punch. It's already so powerful in my hands when I'm just an ordinary person. Now, if I was a Resonator…

Dialogues.Speaker: Vigilant Midnight Ranger
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Careful. Tacetite weapons are not so safe to operate.

Dialogues.Speaker: Excited Midnight Ranger
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Rest assured. I’ll take out those monsters before it blows up in my face!

Dialogues.Speaker: Jiyan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: The Ministry of Development once designed a weapon for non-Resonator units to combat Tacet Discords…

Dialogues.Speaker: Jiyan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: As non-Resonators lacked the necessary <ano=special power>Forte</ano> to control the weapon, and prolonged exposure to Tacetite energy posed health risks, designers limited its output for safety reasons.

Dialogues.Speaker: Jiyan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: That's why the weapons couldn't operate at full power.

Dialogues.Speaker: Jiyan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: After taking over as General, I revamped the Midnight Ranger's recruitment tactics. Our primary combat units now consist of Resonators, with a significant decrease in non-Resonator members who have been reassigned to support roles.

Dialogues.Speaker: Jiyan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I still remember the admirable courage in those ordinary people's eyes, as they volunteered to join the military… but I cannot let more unnecessary casualties happen.

Dialogues.Speaker: Solemn Midnight Ranger
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: The plan is simple. We will use the cliffs as a boundary to divide the battlefield into two.

Dialogues.Speaker: Solemn Midnight Ranger
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Our ranged units will secure the high ground while our ground forces charge through the narrow valley.

Dialogues.Speaker: Solemn Midnight Ranger
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Meanwhile, we will deploy Resonators to the Suspended Ruins, where most of the Tacet Discords are located.

Dialogues.Speaker: Solemn Midnight Ranger
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Squads two and three will flank while General Geshu leads Squad one to break their front line.

Dialogues.Speaker: Solemn Midnight Ranger
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Our goal is to shift from defense to offense and disrupt their strategies. Everything is at stake here.

Dialogues.Speaker: Solemn Midnight Ranger
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: In a word, it's victory or death.

Dialogues.Speaker: Jiyan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Our strategic plan was crafted 3 years ago, taking into account the terrain in Norfall Barrens. Its value remains crucial today.

Dialogues.Speaker: Jiyan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: But now, our enemies are even stronger than before.

Dialogues.Speaker: Jiyan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: There could be unknown risk factors… We must devise a new plan for the current situation.

Dialogues.Speaker: Veteran Midnight Ranger
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Let's join the Riverside Games after we beat that monster.

Dialogues.Speaker: Young Midnight Ranger
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: The Riverside Games...?

Dialogues.Speaker: Veteran Midnight Ranger
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: You won first place in the last armed race, remember? Don't back out now... I already counted you in!

Dialogues.Speaker: Jiyan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: We haven't held the Riverside Games in years. This should be another illusion from the past.

Dialogues.Speaker: Jiyan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: If everything goes well, perhaps we can hold it again this year...

Dialogues.Speaker: Giant Saber with Strange Shape
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: A massive greatsword with a heavy weight. Its texture reveals its power, clearly not meant for the average person.

Dialogues.Speaker: Giant Saber with Strange Shape
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Black chains wrap around the blade and hilt, with swirling patterns resembling rippling waves. Dark flames seem to pulse with life, ready to erupt at any moment.

Dialogues.Speaker: Giant Saber with Strange Shape
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Droplets of water can be seen on it. Are these the tears of this mighty weapon?

Dialogues.Speaker: Jiyan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Why am I seeing this here... Is it another illusion caused by the Retroact Rain?

Dialogues.Speaker: Soldier
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: General!

Dialogues.Speaker: Soldier
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: We've got all equipment repaired, Tacetite weapons adjusted and given to Resonators. Non-Resonators are also equipped and prepared for action.

Dialogues.Speaker: Soldier
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: But... the rain's getting heavier. Should we take shelter for the time being?

Dialogues.Speaker: Soldier
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: One of our combat medics claims it's no ordinary downpour, and he strongly advises holding off any moves until it clears.

Dialogues.Speaker: Soldier
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Though young, his sharp intuition has been proven in previous battles. You've seen it firsthand.

Dialogues.Speaker: Soldier
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: However... I do agree this will be our last chance at organizing another attack.

Options.PlotLineKey: ...The medic you mentioned. What is his name?

Dialogues.Speaker: Soldier
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Sir, his name is...

Dialogues.Speaker: Soldier
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Ji...yan...

Dialogues.Speaker: Soldier
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: General, help... Please... help me...
What do you make of this, Jiyan?
Maybe you are right.
The rain just happened out of nowhere. It's indeed unusual. But...
This is our only chance.
The enemy we've been yearning to destroy is finally right before us.
And now you're asking me to sit back and do nothing because of some Phantoms?
Silence... Is this your response? Or is it fear holding your tongue?
Ah... I see. You’re no different. We fear, we bleed, we suffer, and in the end, we'll all die on the battlefield.
But what about your brethren, friends and comrades? As you witness them viciously slain before your eyes, one by one...
Will you still remain silent when their souls demand an answer?
There is no other choice. We must trample the pile of corpses at our feet and push on. Keep barking orders, keep fighting until every last one of those monsters is gone.
The Retroact Rain merely creates illusions of past events. My soldiers will not succumb to those hallucinations. I will not allow it.
We'll crush anything in our path, no questions asked.
And I will pave the way for us all with my Forte.
If tens, hundreds, thousands more of my men will die… So be it. We will win this battle, by any means necessary.
Jiyan, I have a question for you... What would you have done on that day, if you were in my position?
Whatever you say... I'll never answer those brave souls with such silence and cowardice.

Dialogues.Speaker: Narrator
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: As the Retroact Rain pours, Jiyan is confronted by the ghostly figure of Geshu Lin, the general from the Battle Beneath the Crescent. The phantom challenges Jiyan, questioning how he intends to honor the lives lost and whether he will follow in the footsteps of the past.
Prove yourself to me, Jiyan.
Caught you off guard, didn't they? Just like what happened on that rainy night...
Yes... Go on. Keep fighting.
Fight... Until the last of them is wiped out.

Dialogues.Speaker: Jiyan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: General Geshu Lin... We fight to protect what we cherish.

Dialogues.Speaker: Jiyan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: And we cherish our comrades, not out of cowardice or fear, but out of trust. The trust in their lives' worth.

Dialogues.Speaker: Jiyan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I cannot assure you I am always making the right choice, General.

Dialogues.Speaker: Jiyan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: But we should never build our victory on top of endless sacrifices.

Dialogues.Speaker: Geshu Lin
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Hah, is that so?

Dialogues.Speaker: Geshu Lin
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: As I see it, we are cut from the same cloth, you and I.

Dialogues.Speaker: Jiyan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Perhaps we are indeed, General. I share at least one thing with you. I, too, will draw my blade to fight for what I believe in... and I'll stop at nothing to see it through.

Dialogues.Speaker: Soldier
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: General!

Dialogues.Speaker: Soldier
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: General... You look pale.

Dialogues.Speaker: Jiyan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I am fine. Please go on.

Dialogues.Speaker: Soldier
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: We just detected an intense frequency reaction from that Tacet Field ahead.

Dialogues.Speaker: Soldier
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: That moon... It's gradually turning full now, as you predicted.

Dialogues.Speaker: Soldier
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: The sky... It looks just like how it was during the Battle Beneath the Crescent...

Dialogues.Speaker: Jiyan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: It's time.

Dialogues.Speaker: Soldier
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Sir, the Midnight Rangers are ready. We await your orders.

Dialogues.Speaker: Jiyan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Attention all troops! Take position and get ready to engage!

Dialogues.Speaker: Soldier
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Yes, sir!

Dialogues.Speaker: Jiyan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: "When the moon turns full, a roving traveler shall return"... The prophecy is being fulfilled.

Dialogues.Speaker: Jiyan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Here they are.

Dialogues.Speaker: Jiyan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: They're not coming at us... Are they trying to protect something... Or are they waiting for commands?

Dialogues.Speaker: Jiyan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: With an TD Outbreak of this magnitude and organization, someone must be orchestrating it. Could it be...

Dialogues.Speaker: Narrator
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Shaking off the vision, Jiyan hears a soldier report that the skies look just like they did that fateful battle three years ago. Spotting the approaching Tacet Discords, he suspects a mastermind is orchestrating their actions.

Dialogues.Speaker: Yangyang
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: It looks almost full now.

Dialogues.Speaker: Yangyang
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: And the Retroact Rain falling... Rover, maybe this is "the right time" Madam Magistrate was talking about?

Dialogues.Speaker: Jinhsi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: ...Citizens of Jinzhou, please remain calm and evacuate in an orderly manner as we practiced during previous drills...

Dialogues.Speaker: Chixia
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: It's a pre-recorded broadcast message. Our Magistrate saw this coming, and she had General Jiyan devise an emergency plan a long time ago.

Dialogues.Speaker: Chixia
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: This wave of TD attacks should be over now.

Dialogues.Speaker: Chixia
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: We knew this was coming and we were ready, but oh boy, the amount of TDs is insane.

Dialogues.Speaker: Chixia
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Thanks for coming in time, Rover. It would've taken us much longer to handle this.

Dialogues.Speaker: Chixia
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Oh, Director Taoqi is here too. For a better run down of the situation, you can find her near the city gate!

Dialogues.Speaker: Narrator
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: The moon is waxing, an omen of imminent danger. A message from Jinhsi reveals Jinzhou is preparing to face the threat.

Dialogues.Speaker: Actor No. 1
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Any update on the protective barrier?

Dialogues.Speaker: Actor No. 2
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: We've put in all our resources to repair it as soon as possible, but...

Dialogues.Speaker: Aalto
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Any update on the protective barrier?

Dialogues.Speaker: Taoqi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: We've put in all our resources to repair it. But, if those Tacet Discords keep coming at us, it might not hold up for long.

Dialogues.Speaker: Taoqi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Ah, I presume you must be Rover?

Dialogues.Speaker: Taoqi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Hmm... Maybe we've met somewhere before?

Dialogues.Speaker: Taoqi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Anyway, please allow me to introduce myself. I am Taoqi, a Director at the Ministry of Development. I'm in charge of our defense fortifications.

Dialogues.Speaker: Taoqi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Thank you for lending us a hand.

Options.PlotLineKey: What is this barrier you were talking about?
Is the TD Outbreak still going on?

Dialogues.Speaker: Taoqi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: It's our defense system against the Retroact Rain. It does a good job of keeping the city safe from the rain's effects.

Dialogues.Speaker: Aalto
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: What's more, the current TD Outbreak we're dealing with is directly caused by the Retroact Rain.

Dialogues.Speaker: Taoqi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Once the protective barrier breaks down, Tacet Discords could manifest from inside Jinzhou city...

Options.PlotLineKey: How does the Retroact Rain cause TD Outbreaks?

Dialogues.Speaker: Aalto
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Rover, remember what I told you earlier?

Dialogues.Speaker: Aalto
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: The Retroact Rain is essentially condensed droplets of Remnant Energy that fall from the Etheric Sea.

Dialogues.Speaker: Aalto
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: This Remnant Energy makes it a magnet for Tacet Discords.

Dialogues.Speaker: Aalto
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: It records events from all times and places, allowing those who come into contact with it to witness illusions of past events.

Dialogues.Speaker: Aalto
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: That's what we call the Phantoms of Retroact Rain.

Dialogues.Speaker: Aalto
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: It kind of works like how Resonators "Resonate" with the world. The more you're exposed to the rain, the more realistic those Phantoms become.

Dialogues.Speaker: Aalto
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Oh, and here’s another interesting fact about the Retroact Rain: when it’s raining across a large area, illusions pulled from the memories of multiple people can manifest at once.

Options.PlotLineKey: And the deaths during these battles...

Dialogues.Speaker: Aalto
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Nice catch, Rover.

Dialogues.Speaker: Aalto
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Jinzhou has been a battleground for centuries. That’s why it has to deal with the Threnodian that represents the concept of war, and wars will lead to deaths.

Dialogues.Speaker: Aalto
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Once the Retroact Rain reaches its final stage, there will be thousands of Phantoms... Phantoms of dead soldiers and Tacet Discords.

Dialogues.Speaker: Taoqi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: This is the one major threat that has been looming over Jinzhou.

Dialogues.Speaker: Taoqi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Our Magistrate ordered the construction of this barrier precisely because of that.

Options.PlotLineKey: What's so big about these Phantoms?

Dialogues.Speaker: Taoqi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Indeed the Phantoms should only mechanically repeat what they had been doing. They shouldn't have the ability to interfere with reality.

Dialogues.Speaker: Taoqi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: But the Retroact Rain can be significantly enhanced through the Threnodian's power.

Dialogues.Speaker: Taoqi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: As a result, said Phantoms become increasingly realistic to the point of inflicting real harm on humans.

Dialogues.Speaker: Taoqi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: In that battle three years ago, our soldiers got into a gruelsome fight against countless Tacet Discords, either native to Norfall Barrens, or produced by the Retroact Rain... and endless swarms of Phantoms.

Dialogues.Speaker: Taoqi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: “Phantoms” of Tacet Discords and our fallen soldiers repeated their indiscriminate attacks on everything in their sight.

Dialogues.Speaker: Taoqi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Soldiers could not tell friends from foe. The relentless rain even recreated the brutal deaths of their comrades, etched in vivid detail.

Dialogues.Speaker: Taoqi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: The Norfall Barrens turned into a living hell, and to this day, we can still hear the desperate cries...

Dialogues.Speaker: Aalto
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: The "Battle Beneath the Crescent" was humanity’s first recorded encounter with Retroact Rain enhanced by Threnodian power.

Dialogues.Speaker: Aalto
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Your previous General sent back valuable video recordings of the rain. Those videos provided crucial information, which allowed nations worldwide to speed up their research on defense against the Retroact Rain.

Dialogues.Speaker: Aalto
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Our people at the Black Shores have theorized that the Threnodian, abnormal "moon" sightings, and the Retroact Rain may be linked.

Options.PlotLineKey: Rain indicates changes in the moon’s appearance...
…which in turn reflects the Threnodian’s strength.

Dialogues.Speaker: Aalto
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Yeah, something like that. But it's only a theory. We don't have enough data to verify anything.

Dialogues.Speaker: Aalto
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: So unfortunately, we can't predict Retroact Rains yet, but we know it's closely connected with Threnodians reviving. The TD Outbreaks are another sign.

Dialogues.Speaker: Taoqi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: The moon just changed in an instant. If this theory turns out true, that means...

Dialogues.Speaker: Aalto
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: And Jinzhou's dealing with what happened three years ago.

Dialogues.Speaker: Aalto
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: A Threnodian's revival is never an independent occurrence. They can sense one another through some form of telepathic link.

Dialogues.Speaker: Aalto
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: The revival of a Threnodian in Jinzhou will trigger catastrophic events and affect other nations.

Dialogues.Speaker: Aalto
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: We gotta hustle back to the Tethys base, re-calibrate our Lament Detector, and warn them before it's too late.

Dialogues.Speaker: Aalto
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Anyway, we'll take our leave now.

Dialogues.Speaker: Encore
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Please stay safe...

Dialogues.Speaker: Taoqi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: That's all we've gathered so far, Rover.

Dialogues.Speaker: Taoqi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: The TD Outbreaks won’t stop before the end of this rain. We must stay alert.

Dialogues.Speaker: Staff from Ministry of Development
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Ma'am! There's another wave of them ahead!

Dialogues.Speaker: Taoqi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Sigh. Speak of the devil...

Dialogues.Speaker: Taoqi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I'll NEED to take a very long nap after this.

Dialogues.Speaker: Taoqi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Activate the defense mechanisms!

Dialogues.Speaker: Narrator
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: You find Taoqi overseeing border defenses. Aalto is also present. The protective barrier against the Retroact Rain is under urgent repair, but the onslaught of Tacet Discords continues. Aalto and Encore must return to the Black Shores to warn of the impending revival of the Threnodian, while those remaining prepare for battle.

Dialogues.Speaker: Taoqi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Everyone, hold your ground!

Dialogues.Speaker: Verina
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Leave the healing to me!

Dialogues.Speaker: Verina
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I'm ready to help. Please hold on a little longer!

Dialogues.Speaker: Lingyang
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Our morale is unbeatable. Let's keep it up and crush all our enemies!

Dialogues.Speaker: Lingyang
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: They'll get a taste of our conviction!

Dialogues.Speaker: Taoqi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: The Tacet Discords here have been dealt with. Let’s go reinforce the outpost, it's still under attack.

Dialogues.Speaker: Actor No. 1
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Get lost! You're not getting closer!

Dialogues.Speaker: Actor No. 1
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Hold on! Reinforcement's on their way!

Dialogues.Speaker: Rescued Soldier
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Thank you! Some of us are still fighting in there. We must go help them!

Dialogues.Speaker: Taoqi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Phew... Finally.

Dialogues.Speaker: Rescued Soldier
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: We made it! Thank you so much!

Dialogues.Speaker: Taoqi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: It's dangerous here. Let's head back first.

Dialogues.Speaker: Chixia
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Ugh... Please tell me this is the last one!

Dialogues.Speaker: Chixia
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Rover, your moves are sharp as always. Dealing with so many TDs seems like a walk in the park for you.

Options.PlotLineKey: Can't call it a day without fighting those monsters.

Dialogues.Speaker: Yangyang
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Rover, did you see that?

Options.PlotLineKey: The moon looks even more blurry now.

Dialogues.Speaker: Taoqi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Now it's almost identical to what we saw three years ago, during the "Battle Beneath the Crescent".

Dialogues.Speaker: Taoqi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I'm afraid... We're already running out of time.

Dialogues.Speaker: Jinhsi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Report the situation, please.

Dialogues.Speaker: Taoqi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Madam Magistrate, the barrier has been fully repaired and we have evacuated all residents. We've successfully minimized the damage.

Dialogues.Speaker: Jinhsi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Well done, Director Taoqi.

Options.PlotLineKey: How's it going on your end?

Dialogues.Speaker: Jinhsi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Indeed, it's been a while, Rover.

Dialogues.Speaker: Jinhsi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: It’s been going according to plan, if I may say so. I was made aware of this in advance, and planned out our defense beforehand.

Options.PlotLineKey: Was it another hint from Jué?

Dialogues.Speaker: Jinhsi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Now that we are facing such an emergency, I cannot sit back and wait for Jué to save us. I will act and see my duty through. This is my decision.

Dialogues.Speaker: Jinhsi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I have secured some much-needed aid for our city during my visit to the capital. Also, our experts should be ready by now.

Dialogues.Speaker: Jinhsi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Rover, do you still remember Jué's message for you?

Dialogues.Speaker: Jinhsi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Now we have raindrops that fall upstream, and the Midnight Rangers' General in the Norfall Barrens, ready to take on the <ano=Threnodian>Ovathrax</ano>.

Dialogues.Speaker: Jinhsi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: This must be the right time Jué was talking about.

Dialogues.Speaker: Jinhsi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Rover, it's going to be dangerous. You might... directly confront a Threnodian.

Dialogues.Speaker: Jinhsi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: You eyes look as determined as ever.

Dialogues.Speaker: Jinhsi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I understand how you must feel, Rover.

Dialogues.Speaker: Jinhsi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I have been in a similar situation before. When my life suddenly took a big turn, and I had no choice but to face it head on.

Dialogues.Speaker: Jinhsi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: On the entire Jinzhou’s behalf, I am immensely grateful for your assistance, Rover.

Dialogues.Speaker: Jinhsi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: You will be remembered as a heroic ally in our defense against external threats, regardless of the outcome of this battle.

Dialogues.Speaker: Jinhsi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: May victory prevail the lasting night. I will pray for your safe return.

Dialogues.Speaker: Taoqi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Rover, I have informed border checkpoints across Jinzhou about your trip to the front line. You have been granted unlimited access to all places.

Dialogues.Speaker: Taoqi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Yangyang, you're one of our Outriders. I hope you can go with Rover and provide assistance.

Dialogues.Speaker: Taoqi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: You'll need to pass through a Tacet Field to reach our base in the Desorock Highland. Please be careful.

Dialogues.Speaker: Chixia
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Rover, Yangyang, I'll be keepin' the city safe as a Patroller. Do come back in one piece, okay?

Options.PlotLineKey: You can do it, Ma Xiaofang!
You can do it, Jinzhou Speedster!

Dialogues.Speaker: Chixia
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Thanks! I'll give it my all!

Dialogues.Speaker: Chixia
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Rover! I said don't call me that... Nevermind, we don't have time for this.

Dialogues.Speaker: Chixia
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Wow, thanks, Rover! Can't believe you still remember that title! I'll live up to it for sure!

Dialogues.Speaker: Taoqi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: It seems the rain is not stopping anytime soon...

Dialogues.Speaker: Yangyang
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: The city... What if...

Dialogues.Speaker: Chixia
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Rest assured. You can count on me!

Dialogues.Speaker: Yuanwu
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I will keep everyone safe.

Dialogues.Speaker: Verina
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Me... Me too!

Dialogues.Speaker: Lingyang
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Don't forget us Liondance Troupe!

Dialogues.Speaker: Soldiers
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: We've got this!

Dialogues.Speaker: Taoqi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Hehe, as you can see. Everyone's ready to defend our city.

Dialogues.Speaker: Chixia
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Rover, Yangyang, safe travels!

Dialogues.Speaker: Taoqi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I've informed General Jiyan that you're heading to his place. He will be meeting up with you soon.

Dialogues.Speaker: Chixia
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: May victory prevail the lasting night!

Dialogues.Speaker: Narrator
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: After fending off another wave of attacks, Jinhsi contacts you, announcing reinforcements are on the way. The moment foretold by Jué has arrived. She expresses her gratitude for your defense of Jinzhou and wishes you victory and safe passage through the long night.

Dialogues.Speaker: Jiyan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Defend the south gate! Enemy attack weakening. This wave is almost over!

Dialogues.Speaker: Jiyan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Defend the south gate! Enemy attack weakening. This wave is almost over!

Chapters.Title: Defeat the Tacet Discords in the base

Dialogues.Speaker: Fighting Soldiers
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: North gate! Monsters incoming!

Dialogues.Speaker: Jiyan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Our enemies are spent. Hold your ground!

Dialogues.Speaker: Fighting Soldiers
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: It's over!

Dialogues.Speaker: Jiyan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: All Tacet Discords nearby have been dealt with. Now, the city's defense...

Dialogues.Speaker: Jiyan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Please update me on the situation in Jinzhou city.

Dialogues.Speaker: Taoqi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Under Madam Magistrate's command, the barrier has been activated and citizens are being evacuated to the safe zone.

Dialogues.Speaker: Taoqi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Huaxu Academy and Ministry of Development are on standby for further instructions. Bazhi is overseeing operations at the Academy while Mortefi has arrived at the Ministry. Rest assured, we are all safe in the city.

Dialogues.Speaker: Taoqi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: And that Rover... {Male=He;Female=She} is heading over to meet you. Yangyang is coming with {Male=him;Female=her}.

Dialogues.Speaker: Jiyan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I see. We have successfully contained the Outbreak here at the base.

Dialogues.Speaker: Jiyan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I will go pick them up as soon as possible.

Dialogues.Speaker: Jiyan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: The rain's getting heavier...

Dialogues.Speaker: Jiyan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: There are signs of Tacet Discords reviving. Intense frequency fluctuations detected… they’ll be passing through that area. I must create a safe passage for them.

Dialogues.Speaker: Jiyan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I need to clear the way for them as quickly as possible.

Chapters.Title: Go to the Tacet Field in Desorock Highland

Dialogues.Speaker: Jiyan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: A couple more Tacet Discords here... Time to get rid of them.

Dialogues.Speaker: Jiyan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Is that...

Dialogues.Speaker: Jiyan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: The Thundering Mephis?

Dialogues.Speaker: Yangyang
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: The Threnodian's revival has done significant damage to the environment nearby...

Dialogues.Speaker: Yangyang
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Things have gotten even more dangerous out here. The closer we get to Norfall Barrens, the worse it gets.

Chapters.Title: Go to the Tacet Field in Desorock Highland

Dialogues.Speaker: Yangyang
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: The Streams feel heavy with dread and the smell of blood... There must be a brutal fight going down in the Desorock Highland.

Dialogues.Speaker: Yangyang
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: The Tacet Field Director Taoqi mentioned should be right up ahead. We must pass through it to reach our base and find General Jiyan.

Dialogues.Speaker: Yangyang
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I wonder what other anomalies await us ahead...

Dialogues.Speaker: Yangyang
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Is that one of our soldiers ahead?

Dialogues.Speaker: Yangyang
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: The soldiers... Watch out, they're not real! And the Tacet Discords are coming at us!

Dialogues.Speaker: Actor No. 1
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Did you all see that? The moon... why is it all blurry now?

Dialogues.Speaker: Actor No. 2
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Pull yourselves together. The moon is none of our concern. General Geshu told us to keep fighting no matter what.

Dialogues.Speaker: Yangyang
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: The Phantoms contain a lot of Remnant Energy... These Tacet Discords might be coming after it!

Dialogues.Speaker: Yangyang
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: The rain is spreading across Desorock Highland... I can feel chaos growing in the Streams. We must hurry.

Dialogues.Speaker: Strange Midnight Ranger
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Leave... Leave me alone!

Dialogues.Speaker: Yangyang
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: He's been cornered!

Dialogues.Speaker: Devastated Midnight Ranger
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Who... Who are you! Are you human?! Answer me!

Dialogues.Speaker: Shocked Midnight Ranger
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: What... what are you talking about? I'm Jun!

Dialogues.Speaker: Devastated Midnight Ranger
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: No... you're not... Aghhhh!

Dialogues.Speaker: Shocked Midnight Ranger
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Jingyang... you...

Dialogues.Speaker: Devastated Midnight Ranger
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: You... You are... Jun! No... No no no, what have I done?!

Dialogues.Speaker: Devastated Midnight Ranger
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Sorry... I'm so sorry. I can't tell the differences... I really can't... Ahhh...

Dialogues.Speaker: Yangyang
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: The Phantoms contain a lot of Remnant Energy... These Tacet Discords might be coming after it!

Dialogues.Speaker: Yangyang
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: The rain is spreading across Desorock Highland... I can feel chaos growing in the Streams. We must hurry.

Dialogues.Speaker: Yangyang
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Those soldiers... They are Phantoms too. Watch out!

Dialogues.Speaker: Yangyang
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: More Tacet Discords... Be careful!

Dialogues.Speaker: Yangyang
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: The Phantoms contain a lot of Remnant Energy... These Tacet Discords might be coming after it!

Dialogues.Speaker: Yangyang
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: The rain is spreading across Desorock Highland... I can feel chaos growing in the Streams. We must hurry.

Dialogues.Speaker: Tired Midnight Ranger
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Ugh... When will we ever see the end of this...

Dialogues.Speaker: High-spirited Midnight Ranger
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: General Geshu has already brought us this far. We'll be over this soon!

Dialogues.Speaker: Tired Midnight Ranger
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: That must be the lair of the damned Ova-something. We just need to get rid of it, and that's all.

Dialogues.Speaker: High-spirited Midnight Ranger
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Yeah. Let's not drag our General's feet at least. Gotta step up our game...

Dialogues.Speaker: Tough Midnight Ranger
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Our loved ones are counting on us! If we fail, Jinzhou falls!

Dialogues.Speaker: Timid Midnight Ranger
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Easy for you to say! We're just ordinary folks with no powers!

Dialogues.Speaker: Tough Midnight Ranger
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: We have our will and bodies! Those monsters aren’t going anywhere, not when I'm still alive!

Dialogues.Speaker: Actor No. 1
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: My leg... my leg...

Dialogues.Speaker: Actor No. 2
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Orders are orders. No one's leaving!

Dialogues.Speaker: Actor No. 1
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: You're just asking us to die...

Dialogues.Speaker: Devastated Midnight Ranger
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Who... Who are you! Are you human?! Answer me!

Dialogues.Speaker: Shocked Midnight Ranger
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: What... what are you talking about? I'm Jun!

Dialogues.Speaker: Devastated Midnight Ranger
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: No... you're not... Aghhhh!

Dialogues.Speaker: Shocked Midnight Ranger
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Jingyang... you...

Dialogues.Speaker: Devastated Midnight Ranger
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: You... You are... Jun! No... No no no, what have I done?!

Dialogues.Speaker: Devastated Midnight Ranger
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Sorry... I'm so sorry. I can't tell the differences... I really can't... Ahhh...

Dialogues.Speaker: Actor No. 1
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Who... Who are you! Are you human?! Answer me!

Dialogues.Speaker: Actor No. 2
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: What... what are you talking about? I'm Jun!

Dialogues.Speaker: Actor No. 1
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: No... you're not... Aghhhh!

Dialogues.Speaker: Yangyang
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: The Retroact Rain's effects are worsening... We must proceed with caution.

Dialogues.Speaker: Yangyang
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: There, another wounded soldier!

Dialogues.Speaker: Yangyang
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: The Streams are stabilizing. I don't feel anything unusual about him... He's not a Phantom. Let's go help him out!

Dialogues.Speaker: Dying Midnight Ranger
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Are you... Yangyang? Oh, thank goodness...

Dialogues.Speaker: Yangyang
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: ...What happened here?

Dialogues.Speaker: Dying Midnight Ranger
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: The Thundering Mephis... it came back...

Dialogues.Speaker: Dying Midnight Ranger
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I'm part of the Desorock Highland supply transport team...

Dialogues.Speaker: Dying Midnight Ranger
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: This is where our supply station is... We work to keep our soldiers alive.

Dialogues.Speaker: Dying Midnight Ranger
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: We were on our way, had to go through this Tacet Field...

Dialogues.Speaker: Dying Midnight Ranger
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Thundering Mephis… The rain brought it back to life, crushing our transport…

Dialogues.Speaker: Dying Midnight Ranger
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: In the end, I barely escaped... I can't move anymore...

Dialogues.Speaker: Dying Midnight Ranger
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: This place... Dangerous... Careful... Please...

Dialogues.Speaker: Jiyan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Watch out!

Dialogues.Speaker: Yangyang
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: General!

Dialogues.Speaker: Jiyan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: ...Thundering Mephis.

Dialogues.Speaker: Jiyan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: We must bring it down to keep pushing forward.

Dialogues.Speaker: Jiyan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: ...Begone!

Dialogues.Speaker: Yangyang
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: We did it!

Dialogues.Speaker: Jiyan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: The Thundering Mephis is a blend of countless fallen soldiers' Reverberations.

Dialogues.Speaker: Jiyan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: As long as more soldiers are still dying here, it will always return. Not to mention…

Dialogues.Speaker: Jiyan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Countless souls of our brave soldiers remain trapped in this rain, to this day.

Dialogues.Speaker: Yangyang
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: ...General.

Dialogues.Speaker: Jiyan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Sorry. I should've arrived sooner.

Dialogues.Speaker: Speaker_undefined
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Sorry. I should've arrived sooner.

Options.PlotLineKey: Honored to meet you, General Jiyan.
I think I've seen you before...

Dialogues.Speaker: Jiyan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: The honor is mine, Rover.

Dialogues.Speaker: Jiyan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Yes, allow me to introduce myself. I am Jiyan, the current General of the Midnight Rangers.

Dialogues.Speaker: Jiyan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Is that so? You're a mysterious individual with vast experience. If we had crossed paths before, I wouldn't be surprised.

Dialogues.Speaker: Jiyan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: The Phantoms are mere replicas of the past. Since this is our first time meeting, I wouldn't recognize you if I was one of them. But I do wish we could've met sooner, Rover.

Dialogues.Speaker: Jiyan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Madam Magistrate and Taoqi have informed me of your willingness to assist us. Thank you for lending us a hand.

Dialogues.Speaker: Jiyan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I should properly welcome you with Huanglong's formalities, but as the current situation forbids that, I'll brief you on our plans as fast as possible.

Dialogues.Speaker: Jiyan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I've heard about your deeds from Madam Magistrate. You are a trustworthy ally according to her.

Dialogues.Speaker: Jiyan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Here. It's the Retroact Rain antidote, developed by the Academy.

Dialogues.Speaker: Jiyan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: While the antidote cannot shield you from its effects entirely, it should at least lessen the hallucinations.

Options.PlotLineKey: What if I was a "Phantom", then?

Dialogues.Speaker: Jiyan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: For someone to show up as a "Phantom" in the Retroact Rain, two conditions must be met:

Dialogues.Speaker: Jiyan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Prior exposure to the rain, and a deep connection to the affected area.

Dialogues.Speaker: Jiyan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: You were found in the Gorges of Spirits only recently, and this is your first time setting foot in Jinzhou, ruling out that possibility.

Dialogues.Speaker: Jiyan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Moreover... you possess a similar ability with the legendary hero who once absorbed a Threnodian. Jué prophesied about your arrival.

Dialogues.Speaker: Jiyan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I was told you'd come to the Norfall Barrens one day... To reclaim your lost power from Ovathrax.

Dialogues.Speaker: Jiyan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I'll do everything in my power to help you make that happen.

Dialogues.Speaker: Jiyan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Yes. Madam Magistrate might not be aware of this, as it happened before she was appointed.

Dialogues.Speaker: Jiyan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: On the day I was selected to be the next General, Jué told me this...

Dialogues.Speaker: Jiyan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: "Beneath the full moon, guide the returning one to confront Threnodian. From the threat itself, {Male=he;Female=she} shall reclaim the power to conquer it."

Dialogues.Speaker: Jiyan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: And if you are indeed the "returning one" mentioned here, we may actually get rid of that monster once and for all.

Dialogues.Speaker: Jiyan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: You might have noticed something off about that moon. We call it the "Void Plenilune".

Dialogues.Speaker: Jiyan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Once it fully takes shape... Ovathrax, the Threnodian of War, would be reawakening soon.

Dialogues.Speaker: Jiyan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: It is an ancient terror that reigns over our land, capable of devouring weapon frequencies to enhance itself.

Dialogues.Speaker: Jiyan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: The Norfall Barrens have become a massive graveyard of weapons after countless battles. Those weapons would've made it even stronger than before.

Dialogues.Speaker: Jiyan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: But we must act now. The Void Plenilune is already visible, we must contain the Threnodian swiftly. Any delay could allow it to recover and become harder to deal with.

Options.PlotLineKey: Understood. What are we doing next?
Any suggestions for music at my funeral?

Dialogues.Speaker: Jiyan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: To remain calm in such an extreme situation, your composure is admirable indeed.

Dialogues.Speaker: Jiyan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Hold on! We cannot afford to rush the plan.

Dialogues.Speaker: Jiyan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Fret not. Our enemy is strong, but not unbeatable. I am positive we will prevail.

Dialogues.Speaker: Jiyan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: We'll get into the specifics once we reach our base.

Dialogues.Speaker: Narrator
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: With Jiyan's aid, you successfully vanquish the Thundering Mephis. Jiyan is aware of Jué's prophecy and has been awaiting your arrival. As the Retroact Rain falls, the group heads back to camp.

Dialogues.Speaker: Yangyang
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Wait... Is that...

Dialogues.Speaker: Jiyan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Ovathrax's towering statue, built from repurposed weapons and debris, has long loomed over Jinzhou as a foreboding symbol of our ongoing struggle.

Dialogues.Speaker: Jiyan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: We managed to gravely injure it three years ago, making the statue sink into the water. And now, it just resurfaced... Our enemy must be eager to strike.

Dialogues.Speaker: Jiyan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: The Vanguard Base is right up ahead. Let's hurry over.

Dialogues.Speaker: Jiyan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: We should be safe here.

Dialogues.Speaker: Jianxin
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Greetings, General.

Dialogues.Speaker: Yangyang
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Master Jianxin? Didn't know I'd be seeing you here...

Dialogues.Speaker: Jiyan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Jianxin recently arrived at our base with one of the supply delivery teams. She has been a great help.

Dialogues.Speaker: Jianxin
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: General, you flatter me.

Dialogues.Speaker: Jianxin
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I've heard people comparing the Norfall Barrens to a massive graveyard. Whenever it rains, cries and moans can be heard, as if many ghosts are weeping...

Dialogues.Speaker: Jianxin
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Master once told me life and death should follow a natural course. The heavens and the earth form a vast chamber, where spirits freely depart and return.

Dialogues.Speaker: Jianxin
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Countless brave souls have been trapped here by the evil powers of Ovathrax. I want to help set them free.

Dialogues.Speaker: Jiyan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Please follow me.

Dialogues.Speaker: Jiyan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Our main goal is to contain the reviving Threnodian, but we must beware of the Tacet Discords too. They have shown unpredictability in every past battle.

Dialogues.Speaker: Jiyan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: The Academy determined they were not native to the Norfall Barrens, and instead had been conjured by a mysterious power.

Dialogues.Speaker: Jiyan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: After analyzing their behavior, I believe the source of said power is none other than that statue.

Dialogues.Speaker: Jiyan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: While the Ovathrax is still weakened, we must seize the opportunity to act.

Dialogues.Speaker: Jiyan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: With looming danger from the continued onsets of TD Outbreaks, and many of our units injured and unable to fight, it is crucial to plan our attack wisely.

Dialogues.Speaker: Jiyan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Please, join me in mapping out the strategic plans.

Dialogues.Speaker: Narrator
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: You are surprised to find Jianxin at camp. Jiyan decides to allocate roles and tasks for the looming battle against the Tacet Discords.

Dialogues.Speaker: Jiyan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I have split all combat units into three factions:

Dialogues.Speaker: Jiyan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: The ranged units team will provide fire support from afar while the infantry team engages in close combat. Lastly...

Dialogues.Speaker: Jiyan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: We have the special task force of Rover, Yangyang, Jianxin, and me.

Dialogues.Speaker: Jiyan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Allow me to introduce Konglin, leader of the ranged units team.

Dialogues.Speaker: Jiyan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: And this is Yuehui. He's in charge of the infantry team.

Dialogues.Speaker: Jiyan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: This is a topographic map of the Norfall Barrens.

Dialogues.Speaker: Jiyan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: The Ovathrax's power limits our reach. Outrider scouts can't go beyond the Norfall Barrens and Valley junction.

Dialogues.Speaker: Jiyan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: The deepest we ventured was three years ago, when we discovered the Suspended Ruins in its hinterland.

Dialogues.Speaker: Jiyan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: But the terrain is treacherous; narrow and flanked by high cliffs on both sides, leaving only one path for our troops to travel.

Dialogues.Speaker: Jiyan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: On the other hand, our enemies must take the same route if they want to attack us.

Dialogues.Speaker: Jiyan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: With the Ovathrax reorganizing their frequencies and bringing them back, we will face endless waves of attacks.

Dialogues.Speaker: Jiyan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Every time we cut down an enemy, it gains more power.

Dialogues.Speaker: Jiyan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Time is of the essence. We cannot afford a prolonged battle.

Dialogues.Speaker: Jiyan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: We must swiftly and safely get our strongest units in the heart of the battlefield, reach that statue, and take down Ovathrax in time.

Dialogues.Speaker: Jiyan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Rover, let's plan carefully and use each team's strengths to our advantage.

Dialogues.Speaker: Jiyan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: First, our ranged units. Armed with long-range weapons, they can strike from a distance.

Dialogues.Speaker: Jiyan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: But we need to strategize based on the terrain, topography, and enemy forces.

Dialogues.Speaker: Jiyan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: If we manipulate the terrain to our advantage, their strikes will be more effective and cover a larger range.

Dialogues.Speaker: Jiyan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Where should we deploy the ranged units?

Options.PlotLineKey: On the cliffs, from the sides of the valley.
Behind infantry units, at the valley's bottom.
Among infantry units, they will charge as one.

Dialogues.Speaker: Jiyan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Deploying our ranged units high above the valleys in advance...

Dialogues.Speaker: Rover
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: (Our main battlefield will be at the valley's bottom, where space and vision are limited.)

Dialogues.Speaker: Rover
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: (Placing ranged units behind infantry can slow their aim, making it counterproductive... This may not be the best strategy.)

Dialogues.Speaker: Rover
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: (Mixing ranged and infantry units may seem versatile, but it wastes the advantage of ranged units... This may not be the best strategy.)

Dialogues.Speaker: Jiyan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: This way, they'll provide cover for our close-combat forces while staying safe themselves. We'll use their range advantage to the fullest. It's a smart move.

Dialogues.Speaker: Jiyan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Next, the infantry. They have been trained and equipped for close combat.

Dialogues.Speaker: Jiyan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: The heart of Norfall Valley is our main battleground, where we'll fight our enemies head-on. We need to plan our attack wisely.

Dialogues.Speaker: Jiyan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: How should the infantry engage enemy targets?

Dialogues.Speaker: Jiyan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Now that the narrow terrain has dictated an inevitable confrontation...

Dialogues.Speaker: Rover
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: (We could divert some forces to flank the enemy, disrupting their formation and gaining an edge...)

Dialogues.Speaker: Rover
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: (However, a successful outflank requires a wide battlefield, but the small passage of Norfall Barrens limits our options for movement.)

Dialogues.Speaker: Rover
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: (And we can't predict everything that will happen on the battlefield… Our diversion could leave our frontline vulnerable. It may not be the best strategy.)

Dialogues.Speaker: Rover
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: (To infiltrate enemy lines, a small group of our forces will enter through gaps in their formation and attack from the rear.)

Dialogues.Speaker: Rover
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: (This maneuver takes time and requires caution to avoid detection, particularly in a valley where evasion is difficult.)

Dialogues.Speaker: Rover
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: (Small infiltration forces may stay hidden but risk being overwhelmed by enemy attacks. Alternatively, diverting forces could lead to losing on the main front.

Dialogues.Speaker: Rover
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: (We have little knowledge of what's happening behind enemy lines... Better not act rashly. This may not be the best strategy.)

Dialogues.Speaker: Jiyan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: The infantry will attack head-on, breaking their line. Then our task force can strike where they're vulnerable... A reasonable choice.

Dialogues.Speaker: Jiyan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Lastly, the special task force, all Resonators with powerful abilities. They have superior mobility and combat skills.

Dialogues.Speaker: Jiyan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: If the chance arises, they will be responsible for taking down the Ovathrax.

Dialogues.Speaker: Jiyan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: What should the special task force do?

Options.PlotLineKey: Target the weak point in their formation.
Split up and cover each other.

Dialogues.Speaker: Jiyan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: We'll join our effort to break through their defenses and crush their source of power. This is the only way to completely rout the enemies.

Dialogues.Speaker: Jiyan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: It's a risky but necessary move under our current circumstances.

Dialogues.Speaker: Rover
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: (Hmm... flank tactics aim to avoid direct confrontation and exploit enemy weaknesses to take them down slowly.)

Dialogues.Speaker: Rover
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: (However, our combat power could be drained by the endless enemy assaults if we don't eliminate the Ovathrax in time.)

Dialogues.Speaker: Rover
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: We can't afford to prolong engagement… There may be more effective tactics available.)

Dialogues.Speaker: Rover
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: (We could split into two groups to cover each other during our mission. It could increase safety and efficiency.)

Dialogues.Speaker: Rover
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: (But if we further split up our small team of four, we risk getting outmatched in extreme situations.)

Dialogues.Speaker: Rover
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: (Also, finding cover for everyone may prove difficult during an intense fight.

Dialogues.Speaker: Rover
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: (Perhaps we should consider other options... There may be more effective tactics available.)

Dialogues.Speaker: Jiyan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Thank you, Rover. The battle plan is clear.

Dialogues.Speaker: Jiyan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I will now recap our plan:

Dialogues.Speaker: Jiyan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Konglin, your team will take the cliffs for fire support.

Dialogues.Speaker: Jiyan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Yuehui, your team will charge enemy lines to pave way for the special task force.

Dialogues.Speaker: Konglin & Yuehui
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Aye, sir!

Dialogues.Speaker: Jiyan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: And I'll join Rover, Yangyang, and Jianxin to create an opening for our main forces and take down the Threnodian.

Dialogues.Speaker: Narrator
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: With your input, Jiyan quickly draws up the battle strategy. The ranged units will secure the high ground to support the close-combat troops in the valley as they break through the Tacet Discords' ranks, creating a passage for you, Yangyang, Jiyan, and Jianxin to launch a commando assault on the Threnodian.

Dialogues.Speaker: Jiyan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Good. Are we all clear on what to do?

Dialogues.Speaker: Jiyan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Our next move is to reclaim the Disruptor and break through the Groundwave Barrier.

Dialogues.Speaker: Jiyan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Rover, do you see that iridescent veil?

Dialogues.Speaker: Jiyan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: That's the Groundwave Barrier. Ovathrax set it up to absorb weapon frequencies in the Norfall Barrens without interruption.

Dialogues.Speaker: Jiyan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: One of our top priorities now is to protect the Disruptor from Tacet Discord attacks.

Dialogues.Speaker: Jiyan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: It's a powerful anti-Threnodian weapon from when Jinzhou was founded. We need it to break through this barrier.

Dialogues.Speaker: Jiyan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I'll leave it to the professional to explain the details.

Dialogues.Speaker: Mortefi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Greetings, General Jiyan, Rover.

Dialogues.Speaker: Jiyan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: How's the preparation going on your side?

Dialogues.Speaker: Mortefi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: We've got good news and bad news. Good news is, we've established connection to the Disruptor and we're ready to go.

Dialogues.Speaker: Mortefi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Bad news is, the Disruptor’s electric capacitor is damaged.

Dialogues.Speaker: Mortefi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Simply put, it’s out of power.

Dialogues.Speaker: Mortefi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Fortunately, there should be a backup power outlet.

Dialogues.Speaker: Mortefi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: To use the Disruptor, we'll have to repair that outlet first, then wait for a full charge.

Dialogues.Speaker: Mortefi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Any questions?

Options.PlotLineKey: Can we blow up the Threnodian with this?
Why is it still powered by pre-Lament energy?
Can you make some more Disruptors?

Dialogues.Speaker: Mortefi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: In theory, we could. In practice, it's difficult.

Dialogues.Speaker: Mortefi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: First, it could dodge our attack. Not even a perfect hit can kill it. It will be gravely injured, but not dead.

Dialogues.Speaker: Mortefi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Threnodians have been proven to be way stronger than we imagined. Our Disruptor can't handle the Ovathrax, but it can certainly break through that Barrier.

Dialogues.Speaker: Mortefi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: That's because this ancient Disruptor dates back at least to the founding of Jinzhou.

Dialogues.Speaker: Mortefi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Creating such a powerful weapon with limited technology back then… whoever did it was truly a genius, I must say.

Dialogues.Speaker: Mortefi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: If we were to unleash its full power on Jinzhou city, it might launch the entire place into the air.

Dialogues.Speaker: Mortefi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: ...I can, but it takes time.

Dialogues.Speaker: Mortefi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: No matter how fast I build it... Jinzhou won't be able to hold out that long.

Dialogues.Speaker: Mortefi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: By the way, this is a weapon of mass destruction... The Capital would want strict control over its use, I assume?

Dialogues.Speaker: Mortefi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Will they really approve our application?

Dialogues.Speaker: Jiyan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: The Magistrate and I have it covered. Trust me.

Dialogues.Speaker: Mortefi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Alright, we’ll be waiting for the green light.

Dialogues.Speaker: Mortefi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Lastly, we've got more bad news... Baizhi, please fill us in.

Dialogues.Speaker: Baizhi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Yes.

Dialogues.Speaker: Baizhi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Rover, I am currently monitoring the Tacet Discord attacks from the Academy to design a safer route for you.

Dialogues.Speaker: Baizhi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: We just received word from our soldiers at the emplacement. A large number of Tacet Discords are targeting the Disruptor, and our troops are doing their best to defend it.

Dialogues.Speaker: Baizhi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: The Disruptor has been surrounded by the Tacet Discords, with more of them slowly closing in.

Dialogues.Speaker: Baizhi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: After we recapture the nearby emplacement, it will take some more time for the Disruptor to recharge. You may need to hold out a little longer.

Dialogues.Speaker: Baizhi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I'll send you the coordinates of the Disruptor and its backup energy port. We wish you the best of luck.

Dialogues.Speaker: Jiyan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I trust we all understand the situation now.

Dialogues.Speaker: Jiyan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Rover, Yangyang, please go secure the Disruptor and fix its backup energy outlet.

Dialogues.Speaker: Jiyan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Jianxin, please stay and guard the base. I’ll draw those Tacet Discords away.

Dialogues.Speaker: Jiyan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Let's get moving.

Dialogues.Speaker: Narrator
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: The strategy is set, but the Disruptor is needed to break through the Threnodian's barrier. You and Yangyang assume responsibility for reclaiming it and repairing its power connector.

Dialogues.Speaker: Guard of the Rangers
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: You must be...

Dialogues.Speaker: Yangyang
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Yangyang, an Outrider. General Jiyan sent us here to help. How are things going?

Dialogues.Speaker: Guard of the Rangers
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Those monsters have occupied the emplacement with a surprise attack, but a few brave troops are still holding on.

Dialogues.Speaker: Guard of the Rangers
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: We've blocked off access to protect our base, but I'm opening it up for you.

Dialogues.Speaker: Guard of the Rangers
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Please, they need your help. We’re counting on you!

Chapters.Title: Take the elevator to reach the Disruptor
Defeat the TDs around the Disruptor.

Dialogues.Speaker: Yangyang
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: The Tacet Discords are everywhere... They’ve cornered a soldier! Over there! He needs our help!

Dialogues.Speaker: Yangyang
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: We should be safe now. I hope he's alright... Let's go check on him.

Dialogues.Speaker: Heavily-injured Midnight Ranger
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: General... is that you...

Dialogues.Speaker: Heavily-injured Midnight Ranger
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Is that so... Great...

Dialogues.Speaker: Heavily-injured Midnight Ranger
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: We know how important... This cannon is...

Dialogues.Speaker: Heavily-injured Midnight Ranger
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: We kept it safe... Never let them have it...

Dialogues.Speaker: Speaker_undefined
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Despite Yangyang's efforts to help the soldier, it seems that the soldier's condition is no longer showing any signs of improvement.

Dialogues.Speaker: Heavily-injured Midnight Ranger
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: This... Reparation Key... Take it...

Dialogues.Speaker: Heavily-injured Midnight Ranger
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I may not see our victory in person...

Dialogues.Speaker: Heavily-injured Midnight Ranger
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Please... please defeat that monster... for us...

Dialogues.Speaker: Heavily-injured Midnight Ranger
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Thank... you...

Dialogues.Speaker: Yangyang
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: ...Yes, we will win. Please... rest in peace.

Dialogues.Speaker: Narrator
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: A Midnight Ranger breathes his last. This strengthens your resolve to finish charging the Disruptor and use it to face the Threnodian.

Dialogues.Speaker: Yangyang
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: There's more Tacet Discords closing in...

Dialogues.Speaker: Yangyang
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: The backup outlet's all fixed, but the Disruptor will take a while to recharge. Please help us keep those monsters away, Rover!

Chapters.Title: Protect the Disruptor from incoming TDs

Dialogues.Speaker: Yangyang
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Disruptor 50% charged... Enemies ahead. Watch out, Rover!

Chapters.Title: Protect the Disruptor from incoming TDs

Dialogues.Speaker: Yangyang
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Disruptor's at 80%! Their offense is weakening. Hold on just a little longer, Rover!

Chapters.Title: Protect the Disruptor from incoming TDs

Dialogues.Speaker: Yangyang
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Disruptor's fully charged! Rover, let's take out the remaining Tacet Discords together!

Chapters.Title: Protect the Disruptor from incoming TDs

Dialogues.Speaker: Yangyang
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: It's him, General Jiyan!

Dialogues.Speaker: Jiyan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Well done.

Dialogues.Speaker: Jiyan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: ...The rain has stopped.

Dialogues.Speaker: Baizhi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: General, the Retroact Rain's effects are subsiding. We are observing a sharp decline in the number of Tacet Discords in the Norfall Barrens.

Dialogues.Speaker: Mortefi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: The Disruptor is fully charged and ready to fire. But...

Dialogues.Speaker: Mortefi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: It takes a lot of energy to fire the Disruptor. If we missed...

Dialogues.Speaker: Jiyan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: ...This is our only chance.

Dialogues.Speaker: Jinhsi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Greetings. Can you hear me?

Dialogues.Speaker: Jinhsi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: As the Magistrate of Jinzhou, I have obtained the approval to use the Disruptor in combat.

Dialogues.Speaker: Jinhsi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: The enormous energy consumption, the risk of a misfire, and the weight of this decision... I will bear the responsibility.

Dialogues.Speaker: Jinhsi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I alone will be accountable for the outcome of this battle, whatever it may be.

Dialogues.Speaker: Jinhsi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: General, Rover, please march on.

Dialogues.Speaker: Jinhsi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: May victory prevail the lasting night. I pray for your safe return.

Dialogues.Speaker: Jiyan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: ...Thank you for your trust, Madam Magistrate.

Dialogues.Speaker: Jinhsi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: No need for that, General. We've always shared the same goal, you and I.

Dialogues.Speaker: Jinhsi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Attention, all units. Do everything you can to assist. You are authorized to use the Disruptor!

Dialogues.Speaker: Jiyan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Target, the Norfall Barrens.

Dialogues.Speaker: Jiyan & Jinhsi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Defend Jinzhou at all costs!

Dialogues.Speaker: Narrator
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: With the Disruptor now operational, Jinhsi grants permission to fire it, stating that she alone will take responsibility for the fallout while urging you to press ahead.
